title: note role
description: A section whose content is parenthetic or ancillary to the main content of the resource.

assertions.rationale: Users need to be aware of the note context

assertions.title: convey its name
assertions.rationale: convey the name of the note

assertions.title: convey boundaries
assertions.rationale: Users need to know when they enter and exit a note so that they can differentiate it from surrounding content.
examples: Screen readers might announce the starting boundary by conveying the role.
Screen readers might announce the ending boundary by conveying something like "leaving note".
